I'm writing this review after 2 weeks of usage. Overall phone performance is

Not getting heat while usage. Gets little heat while charging. HD games works
without lag. Menu is little difficult arranged icons manually, getting used to
it. Headset is not provided in the kit.

I am very satisfied with the phone and this was delivered in less than 24 hrs.

It does its job well considering the price. Camera is better than Samsung

title: A Good Budget Mobile with Super Specs
It's a nice phone for this price range
Just awesome
Best you can get at this price
Awesome!
Overall good, but battery capacity compromised
Best in 11 to 13 thousands
Product is very good with many feature battery backup good screen good camera ...
A Decent Phone
Worth buying phone if u want ur device to look good along with the good snapper.
review:
I bought this about 15 days back. After 2 weeks usage, find the Honor 6X great
value for money at 13k (with accessories). Overall I would give it a rating of
4.5 stars. 4 GB RAM and 64 GB Memory means cutting edge specs for Super
Performance.  
  
1\. Battery - Very good. Easily lasts a day with moderate usage like mine.- 4
stars  
2\. Speed - With 4 GB RAM its super fast. No lags. - 4.5 stars  
3\. Sensor - Finger print setup and usage very easy. - 4.5 stars  
4\. Memory - Mine's 64 GB and am left with about 48 GB for my files. Super -
4.5 stars  
5\. Looks and feel - Very compact and fits nicely in your hands. Buttons
within easy reach. Not exactly premium looks, but pretty good - 4.5 stars  
6\. Camera - I am not a heavy user of this feature but found the picture
quality more than adequate. Excellent edit options for camera buffs - 5 stars  
7\. Call Quality - Good, clear and crisp, though I would have preferred the
maximum earpiece volume up by two notches - 4 stars  
  
Cons I could notice are i) made in China tag (saw it on on the box) 2) lack of
an instructions manual &, 3) no earphones. But that's too much to expect at
this price.  
  
To sum up, a good budget phone with Super Specs.

It's a nice phone for this price range. I have been using this for 2 months
now.  
Build quality is good  
Ram is good, that the phone doesn't hang. The new Android 7 is has this split
screen option where you can run two apps at the same time. I tried it and it
works fine without any heating problem or without closing other background
apps.  
Tried using it with hotspot on while charging to check for heating or hanging
issues.. no over heating problem.  
Display quality is good. Nice sound quality too.  
Have no problems in making calls or anything. The person on the other end is
able to hear clearly.  
The phone has a 4G shortcut icon so that we can access 4g even at low coverage
areas, this comes in pretty handy if you have to send a document or something
while traveling or while in a low network area. Camera quality is not that
bad. Some pics are actually pretty awesome. Camera has some good features.
Front cam is also good. Front cam image is not dark or blurry.  
Fingerprint sensor works great. Detects really fast . Battery life is also
good. Doesn't drain quickly.  
The only setback is it doesn't have Gorilla glass. So you try not to drop it
too much. Also it has a small curvy display, which is good for viewing, but it
is hard to find a tempered glass that fit perfectly, because of the curve. But
all the phones with curvy display has this same problem.  
In conclusion, I'm really happy with this phone, it's powerful, and does
everything it is supposed to do..

Mobile is awesome.  
Using from past 4 months. No single issue till now.  
Excellent camera quality.  
Good performance.  
Just go for it

The phone's camera is best you can get at this price. Performance is very
smooth and never lags. NO HEATHING PROBLEMS. Can handle games like modern
combat, asphalt extreme, asphalt 8, dead trigger 2 very smoothly. I bought
this phone 11 months ago and still it is as good as new. Battery backup is
very awesome although it is 3350 but it woks like more than 4000. Lasts for 1
and ½ days easily.

I have used the phone for about a month and I would say it's splendid!  
I purchased this phone during the great Indian sale and got the 64gb varient
for 13k and further I am eligible for 1.5k cashback. That amounts to 11.5k and
at this price it's an absolute steal.  
PROS:  
->Camera (Best in class for the price, hands down)  
->Day to day performance is top notch and absolutely no heating. Kirin 655 rocks.  
-> Battery life is decent 1 and half days on a single charge and normal usage. Phone charges in about 2hrs 15 minutes.  
->All sensors are present and pedometer is a bonus.  
->EMUI 5 is feature rich, elegant and snappy.  
->The screen has nice viewing angles and the colours are pretty accurate. It's quite sharp and and has enough brightness for outdoor visibility.  
  
CONS:  
->With dual SIM only one slot acts as 4G and the other reverts to 2G only.  
->The back has a faint and wierd creeking sound but it can be easily fixed by using a case, so not a major issue.  
->The speaker output has decent loudness but the quality is not up to the mark.  
->No Equaliser settings are present in the phone.  
->No Gorilla Glass protection.  
  
I would advise everyone to put case on the phone as it helps in protecting the
camera lens and the edges are slightly raised and screen is also protected.

Great.  
Battery backup is good,lasts for 1 day in normal heavy use,, but full screen
on time with hd youtube browsing will only last for 5 to 6 hours. It should
have more battery capacity about 5000 mah, if so, then this phn will be a
master blaster adaaru item.... He he...  
Touch smoothness is not good,, most of times while scrolling down, it slips
and not in our control,, and this was soo irritating, i think after some time
i will become adjust with it.  
Length is much lengthy. Not suitable in one hand.  
Phone is slippery, u can't use it without good back cover.  
Front camera sucks,,, too bad... But back cam is too much good, gives perfect
shots...  
UI is complicated, but good when u used to it.  
Slim and weightless.  
Overall good, but battery capacity compromised.

I'm fully satisfied with its features and performance.  
Camera is far better than redmi devices and vivo y55s.

Pros :  
Sleek Design.  
Good Viewing Angles.  
Amazing Camera ( In Day Light ).  
Don't know if this supports fast charging but charges the phone is less than 2
hours.  
Fingerprint Sensor Functionalities.  
Decent Battery Backup.  
Call connectivity is amazing.  
  
Cons:  
Even though I got an update to Android. 7.1.1 the phone hangs up a lot and
need to force restart every time this happens.  
Low light photography is below average.  
Selfies don't have that extra punch to the image.  
Phone volume and earphones volume not so great.  
Doesn't connect properly to any public shared wifi.  
Not enough range for wifi.  
3G/4G lacks the speed that other devices carry.  
No resale value.

This is my first time to write review on Amazon. I used to change my phone
every 2-3 months depend on the impression of the phone that gave me. But after
using honor 6x for a week I feel I may spend more time on this phone. Main
highlight feature of this phone  
1\. Dual camera set up which gives an impressive result.  
2\. The phone looks really good and lightweight.  
3\. Battery capacities is more than average. It can easily last a day for a
normal user.  
4\. This phone is value for money.  
5\. While holding the phone the device feels very slim.  
6\. UI of the phone is very good.  
7\. This phone is made for a low light shooting.  
  
However, I face some issue not actually an issue but I must say my dislike
about this phone.  
1\. Battery got heating up if u r charging for a long time.  
2\. If u r expecting too much in Bokeh effect or portrait mode pliz don't
since the bokeh effect does't came out expected result as that of one plus 5
or iPhone 7. I should say the quality of bokeh effect is poor. U wound't get
expected result.  
3\. The processor of the phone is far lacking behind if u r a gamer never
considered buying it. I play some simple game and it crashed.  
  
Overall this phone is worth buying.

Got it yesterday and I love it. It has quick charging which is a blessing and
the battery is also pretty strong. The phone has no issues latching on to any
of the bands used by Reliance Jio for VoLTE calls and it's crystal clear with
no issues with call or data reception. The fingerprint sensor is really good
and quick. You will get Android 7 Nougat and EMUI 5 update once you boot up
the phone and check for updates. And Android Oreo willl also come to the phone
as Honor already confirmed it. The camera is also good. Out of the 64 GB you
get around 51gb of usable internal storage.  
  
Things to note  
  
You don't get earphones or protective case with the device. And screen
protector is already applied out of the box.  
  
It's a wise investment.

The Honor 6x is a very good entry level smartphone!  
For the price its superb!  
Way better in camera comparison than the redmi note 4  
The major thing of me purchasing this phone was the camera specs, trust me
this guy will deliver you some very good photos in day as well as low lights!  
The 3gb ram version was kinda the optimum choice for me because i am not a
hardcore user!  
But i am running some very heavy files simultaneously and they run with no
problem whatsoever!  
And talking about memory there's always room for a memory card!  
The phone actually looks prettier in person  
It is sleek but slippery  
The screen clarity is very very good!  
I didn't find any heating issue after using the camera for too long  
The battery backup is good too!  
Highly recommended!  
Go for it!

My first Huawei cellphone. It is durable and has all features i need. Mainly i
wanted long battery life, better call quality and some processing power for
video games/media. My previous smartphone was Google nexus 5 and although you
cant compare a cellphone that was built 5 years ago with a celphone built
recently , i feel huawei purchase was not bad at all. 2 days battery life ( no
wifi), reasonable camera, not very expensive and still impressive enough to
show off to friends.

Honor - i could mark as reliability. It is quite suited for this product.
Every software and hardware available with this kit is fantastic. Only area
which I feel low is from its camera. If you zoom in a picture once taken, it
is not so precise (which pix-elate). This camera output compensate color and
doesnot produce the exact description of colors in the object.  
  
I tried to pic a car where it was covered with dust particles, the camera
doesn't capture the dust particles, rather it compensate the majority color on
the entire car.  
  
Overall, I'm completely satisfied with the product's performance. I love when
I place Asphalt 8 with this mobile. No heating issue or battery drain-up. Love
it!  
  
Thank you, Honor.

Ultimate phone in the price segment. Now on emui 5.0 with nougat. Looks
stylish in black. No problems till now. Better than competitors and regular
updates. Camera is awesome as per price. Battery life is amazing. Install
hibernator app from playstore. Better than redmi note 4 and moto g4 plus.  
  
Pros  
-Camera awesome in both lighting conditions.  
-Battery er life excellent even with heavy usage lasts 24 hours.  
-Android 7.0 and emui 5.01  
-Dual camera  
-No heating problem  
-will get oreo update  
  
Cons  
-slow motion video at 480p only  
-image noisy bit in indoor conditions with low lighting  
-whatsapp hangs sometimes

Perfect camera phone , dual camera is just good ya it's admittable that the
portrait is not up to the mark because of the setup. But this kind of dual
setup helps you to get a better low light pictures. That's why OnePlus also
Switched to this setup in op5 T . And the front cam is just the best you could
get at this price point, no other phone perfoms so well with front cam.  
Ya if you just need a 2x zoom and better portrait choose the Mi a1 , and need
a better low light, selfi mode choose this one and the pro mode is best part
and no other phone would provide such a pro mode. Ya I know Honor 7x has come
, but it's not a big upgrade as screen resolution is lower and beside the
infinity display the phone has nothing new , even the design is not good for
regular use as could damage the cam setup. Processor is a bit upgraded not
that much.  
But I think proper care and covers may help & choosing that one is also good
if you just need a new gen display. But if you want better resolution opt for
this or honor 9i (which is bit costly).  
Performance___________________________________the performance is good and can
play many of the graphic intensive games without lags and can store much of
apps and games . So performance is not a issue, sometimes now I get some
framedrops in some of the games very rarely I think it's bcz I have loaded
more than 100 apps and games.  
Design_________________________________________design is good but very prone
to scratch and damages as it is metal surfaced , a slight hit could get some
straches or bends and the screen is too delicate can break if you drop it down
. So get a tempered glass and cover so that it doesn't get damaged.  
Many say that the audio quality of speakers is not good . But actually it's
good and gives loud sound in indoors. Outdoors every phone just fails to get a
audible sound tested with Mi a1 and Xiaomi note 4 .  
Battery life is good due to the battery backup and software, for a normal user
it's two days and a heavy users may get a battery life of 1 day.  
___so at last the it's up to you, choose according to your needs and
preferences & not according to friends or 3rd person advice or tte best value
for money phone_______________________________  
I also on YT , channel name is TecH 16 and also there a fb page , any doubts
or difficulty to choose a phone just msg me your budget, requirements and
preferences of features and i would suggest you the best.

Excellent budget phone just as advertised and in fact more. Astounding battery
consumption optimization, thanks to the EMUI. Performance is good but the
metal body causes makes it hot fast... Maybe that will affect the chipset life
in the long run. Though build quality is good, durability is down the drain -
no Gorilla glass, no support of metal body to phone giving no structural
support. Charging takes a while but is compensated by battery life. Cameras
are beyond excellence. Overall its a good product with bad durability. If you
want to go for it, you have to spend a little more on tempered glass and
protective cover if you want it to stay all nice and fast even after a few
drops.

Best Camera and rest all is better than most phones in the market although a
little improvement in battery go for it without any hesitation!!Although i
would prefer Redmi Note 4 over Honor 6x it is tough competitor...

Amazing product- totally happy. Great camera.. one of the most affordable dual
cameras when I bought.. Now you've more options in this price range. Detailed
review on my blog. Limitations- either 2 SIM Cards or 1 SIM and 1 memory.
Can't have 2 SIM card + memory card. The non removable battery and having to
carry that pin is not very convenient. Otherwise overall very good phone.

I love honor so so so much.. Honor is my love. I m a hardcore fan of Huawei
and honor. I purchased honor holy and then I was amazed with its speciality.
Then I unfortunately bought redmi Note4 in between but disappointed with its
usage. Then opted this mobile which is honor 6x. It fulfilled all my
expectations and beyond my expectations too. It has great things which other
mobiles dont have. It does things which latest mobiles fails to do. Even
though I have dropped it several times it didnt break. I dropped my phone from
a running bus, trust me Still worked awesome and no scratch too. It has so
many specifications really u will enjoy when u use it. Camera is good. It has
many options too. U can also have running video at the top to watch and use ur
mobile simultaneously. It never hangs even if u use more than half space of
internal memory. Redmi mobiles and Samsungs hangs a lot. This phone doesnt
heat up too. It has WiFi and wifi bridge too and another coolest option is
when u shake ur mobile the wallpaper display will change automatically and it
also contains voice command calls too which means it detects ur voice and
calls that particular person. U can also change the color of the display And
its size too. This mobile gives so many inbuilt applications to enjoy such as
mirror, campus,health check and all UC apps. If u buy this mobile u will
surely enjoy. What I have said is very little. There is lot more to amuse us.
Thanks for those who read this.I have also attached few pictures which I room
from this honor 6x mobile.

Super mobile .. But note some drawbacks if it is ok.. Then go for it..  
1\. Video clarity is low  
2\. Hybrid sim slot  
3\. Slippery while hand it  
4\. No front flash  
5\. Speaker quality is low.  
6\. Ear phone and vr headset not available  
7\. Phone memory storage availablity is 49gb only.

I bought this phone for 15k. I still won't regret even though the prices have
fallen diwn to 12k. Been using this phone for almost 6 months now and it is
one of the best phones out there.  
The build quality is great, it feels awesome to hold in hand. It has slipped
many times from heights as far above as my shoulder, yet, no shatters or
dents. The screen as well as fingerprint sensor is very responsive. The best
thing in the phone is its camera. Kirin processor adds a cherry on the top by
giving very good performance and optimizing battery usage despite of having a
small one.

Overall very good phone at this price point. I have used this phone for more
than 6 months now.  
Positives : Excellent battery management, processor speed is very good and
don't see a lag, upgrades for operating systems and installations have been
very smooth so far, does not need to install any additional utility apps as
the base system brings most necessary ones like cleaning tool, etc  
Could be better : camera in low light, dual sim but one slot gets into micro
SD

I used 5 phones before this in last 5 years and then I used it, I must say I
loved it. If you are not hungry for high end games and high end name then it's
for you. Superb phone with great look, light weught and comfortable to use.
Excellent battery life which easily stays with you for more than 24 hours if
you use your phone for continuous browsing and average 50-60 phone calls.  
Performance is buttery smooth with no lag at all and camera is superb with
multiple modes which are actually useful.  
  
Highly recommended for the people who are looking for a great midrange device
which is good looking, light weight and has great battery, smooth performance
and superb camera.

review:

Initially I purchased Samsung J7 prime being Samsung user for last 10 years
.Never had second thought to buy any other brand.within 3 days connectivity
issues .. Service centre accepted return..after lot of research, thought of
taking risk to go with Honor 8 but dropped being single sim..and I placed
order for 6x..  
Best phone ..really Happy ..it can beat high end mobiles ...all of us know any
mobile will last only for 2 years..then why spend 20-30 k ?  
This phone I loved it...good speed , Battery is best, Good network
connectivity, UI is one of the best ...many small things are useful..  
I think within the price this deliveries very high end performance..I am end
user and first time writing review on website being satisfied with brand.

At this price it's an unbelievably super hit phone..... camera is better than
many expensive phones, processor is so advance that you can work on several
apps at the same time, back is metallic with a finger print scanner that makes
this phone commendable........

Im sure most of you might think the k8 note or coolpadcool1 are almost neck to
neck with this phone... However, coolpadcool1 has heating issues while my
experience with lenovo has not been very good. Though i have not experienced
this myself but through two of my very close friends both of whom owned a
lenovo phone once and suffered hardware problems within a yead and very poor
customer service. In the end they had to buy a new phone because they had no
other choice.  
The honor 6x is not only a feature rich phone but also packs a punch with a
good battery life and performance along with a very good camera. It is for me
an all-rounder phone who knows how to do his job. And does it well.

It has been delivered on 14th August 2017. I was bit scared of this brand but
when I started using this... Found better than the order mobile phones.
Specially it has a very good camera and camera focus. It look like, pictures
has been shot from a DSLR camera. I am playing the game from the day I bought,
but doesn't hang or heat. Very good mobile phone in this price range. 😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀

My mom's been using it for a while now. Better than redmi... OPPO... vivo...
etc... I bought it at a higher price as it was a new launch then. Now cheaper.
Buy this phone. This phone can be compared to Samsung's 15 to 20k phone. 6x
has never hanged and my mom uses a lot of apps and games. I'm impressed.

After using phone for one week..i struggled between redmi4 and honor6x ..Main
reason to buy this CAMERA ..becoz camera and battery are the most people's
requirements..go for pros and cons ...  
CONS-  
1.Biggest problem in this honor device is..Audio output..its not only the
volume but also audio output itself is baaaad..i am a audiophile..i thought to
correct it by equalizers but its a time waste ..so if u luv music u will get
hurt by the honor audio output..i have used senheiser/sony/skull candy ..but
honors audio output beats their excellency nd give u the horrible output  
2.next all are minor cons- some times glitches  
happen,hang one for 1or 2secnds when there is heavy functioning  
3.In camera in normal mode also..the more the clarity in the middle grids..the
more the blurr in the corners...corners are so blurred in the images..dnt knw
why ..  
4\. I just really dnt like the branding in front wasting so much space..  
5.let look into some NO - NO ir (infra red )facility + in redmi devices, No
double tap sensor, No fast charging its usb type B only ...dont use while
charging..back is metallic one so u will feel definitely heat .. after
charging remove the pin keep for 5-10 mints then use ..  
Now PROS Which u will like more  
1.BATTERY-..NEVER EXPECTED This from honor ..its a 3400 mah battery ...but it
can make ur whole day ..screen on time with mobile data like heavy usage -
easily u can get 13-14 hrs a day..for rest if ur a just popup visitor u can
last for 1nd half day easily... specifically should mention about the power
saving modes  
2 modes - power saving mode& ultra power saving mode -excellent ways for
battery life  
3.RAM management- u wnt believe this ..actually i got 3 gb ram one ..in my mi
tab when i open about 10 apps the ram will be about jst 100 mb left and phone
will be slow...but i was shocked with honor ...i nearly opened about 15
apps..its still gives 1.8gb freee..and when u open these apps they wont reload
also...this might be the main reason for such a long battery life also..i was
so impressed  
3.CAMERA- As u all knw it is at its best..best thing is front cam is so good
and in artificial light alsoit gives u the best output.. but dnt expect beyond
with this..its a 13mp cam only it cant make miracles in CLARITY but showcases
the pic in beautiful way ..up on zooming its all grain u get ..but its the
best camera i have used around 10k range..best for photography people  
Conclusion-BADLY needed batterylife and photography..go for it  
But if u luv music - think twice /thrice before buying it ..

I am so happy with this Honor mobile! At this modest price it is offering a
very fast and flawless system equipped with all the weapons needed for a
professional use and at the same time it is an excellent playmate! What a
wonderful camera! Thank you Huawei!

Excellent camera quality --- Both front & rear however the review is all for
looks, camera, speed & display etc but not for music output quality is NOT

Amazing phone at this price. I bought it in Great indian sale and the product
was delivered just within 4 days.  
  
About the phone:  
It is amazing phone by honor. The blend of dual camera Kirin 655 octa core
processor and 4gb ram fits in and works perfectly although the software
installed was marshmallow 6.0 and i expected it to come with nougat installed
but its okay you can manually update the phone.  
The design and build quality is also good "Better then MI phones". It has 64gb
internal storage so you never run out of storage and the UI is also very good.

Its an outstanding combo of camera and GUI.specially d dslr mode is
amazing...I tried Redmi note 4 also,but camera quality was hazy and quite
dark,even u can take pics ni d day time it's seems like it's a ni8 pic.so
finally I purchased honor 6x.  
Pros:1) amazing dual camera, especially front one.  
2).it's GUI  
3).it's a slim phone.  
4).fast charging.  
5).many amazing hidden features.  
6).it's a no.1 in dis range.  
Cons:1).dual app features for all app,only provided in it for fb & what's app.  
2).sound quality should be improved.  
  
But overall,if you are going for review in YouTube n all,it's my suggestion
don't mingle in up,simply have a look in ur surrounding if any one have your

I have been using this from around last 3 months, previously i was using motoG
Turbo and it is a lot better phone in terms of everything except the build
quality. screen get scratched easily and phone is bend from one side i don't
even realized when.  
  
-Camera  
It has a great camera in this price range and it offers a lot of shooting
modes, Portrait mode is just fine, i don't use it much but sometimes it gives
really good results. it even provides a pro mode but sadly no raw support, it
can shoot 1080 video with good audio pick up, it can shoot slow motion video
but it is bad. front camera and video quality is decent. overall the camera is
really good for the price and moreover the camera software rocks !!  
  
\- Battery  
One can expect a full day of battery life with heavy usage easily. if you are
a normal use it can last you about1.5 to 2 days. Very Happy with the battery
cause i never have to think about it for the whole day. it would have been
great to see the fast charging though.  
  
-Display  
Great Display with good color reproduction.  
  
-Performance  
I don't play games so i wont talk about gaming performance. Overall good
performance in day to day usage. but now i feel there is a bit of lag
sometimes after updating to emui 5.0, it happens rarely till now so, not much
worried about it.  
  
If you are a person who wants good camera phone in this price range with
decent battery life go for it. i chose it over redmi note 4 for camera.  
i wish it would have a better build quality, a bit loud n clear audio from
speakers and raw support in camera. Hope this helps.  
  
Thanks

Honor 6X is the best camera smartphone you can buy at this price.  
Let me start my review.  
PROS :  
1\. 5.5 FHD display  
2\. Awesome battery life  
3\. Quick charging  
4\. 64 GB Memory is enough  
5\. Fingerprint Sensor is very accurate.  
6\. Multi tasking is very smooth.  
7\. Additional uses of fingerprint sensor like swipe left right to change
picture when you have opened the gallery. Swipe up down to open notifications
and swipe right to clear notifications.  
8\. Front camera takes pretty good selfies.  
  
CONS :  
1\. Hybrid slot  
2\. No USB C type cable  
3\. No front flash  
  
Verdict: If you are confused between redmi note 4 or honor 6x then you must go
for honor. If you think about price then it is only 1k more than note and on
the occasion of so many sales on Amazon you can get it for 13k which is
similar to redmi note 4. Redmi note 4 only have more mah of battery but in all
other departments honor 6x completely outclass RMN4. And when it comes to
battery also it has quick charge which takes less time when it comes to
charging. So without having a 2nd thought you can go for this phone if you are
looking for a solid smartphone with pretty good camera, battery, performance
and after sale services. Huawei(honor) is a more established brand then xiaomi
and have more number of service center in India so you will get better after
sale services.

I am totally satisfied with this phone. I bought this phone at Rs.9,999. I am
going to list the pros and cons of this device.  
  
Pros.  
1\. Best Camera in this price segment.  
2\. Its speakers are not bad as described in the other reviews. The sound
quality is not excellent but is up to the mark.  
3\. Performance of this device is very good. I have not experienced any lags
in 15 days of usage of this phone. There is always 1.7-1.8gb of RAM free in
the 3gb variant.  
4\. Multitasking is very good. Memory Management is excellent.  
5\. Call Quality is excellent.  
6\. Battery Backup is also very good. I charge this phone once in 1.5 days.  
  
Cons.  
The only con is that it has a hybrid sim slot. But you can use both sim cards
and a memory card by buying a hybrid sim adapter.  
  
Overall this phone is worth buying as it is the best in its class.

Today i am going to give you guys a short review on honor 6x. Well, the
packaging was great. The was in good condition.  
1\. This phones main feature is the dual camera 12MP+2MP. The camera quality
is good during daylight.But tge night or low light photo shoot is not that
great. Maybe better than some other mid range phone but, not very good. I am
kinda disappointed on the camera. Maybe i expected too much.  
2\. The screen quality is good. Its 1920x1080 resolution which is great. The
sunlight readability is also fine. Overall i am happy with the 2.5D screen.
The videos look great.  
3\. The sound quality is not good. The bass is worse. The high and lows are
also medium. The speaker is not good for listening to music.  
4\. The battery works fine. It gives a full day usage with normal use. I am
pretty satisfied with its battery.  
5\. The performance is not great in Android 6.0. But after upgrading to
Android 7.0 the performance is superb. You can run any high def. games
smoothly on this device. The memory management is also good in this phone.  
6\. This phone doesn't include headphone with it. Although sound in headphone
is far better than speaker.

what I really like about the phone is its standout camera features. With this
phone I can actually use the pro mode which enables me to adjust the images
exactly the right adjustments. and the other features of this phone are
actually proving quite handy without the need to install third party apps. I
love this phone. I'm a guy whose priority for buying an android phone is the
camera. And I can tell you I'm really satisfied with this one. in fact I did
compare with my cousin's dual camera phone of the same range. but this phone
stands out excellent in almost all aspects.  
The battrey backup is awesome as it gives you options to actually control the
apps permissions to run in background so in that way you can save a lot of
power.  
With all the negative comments about this phone, I don't find them worthy,
it's all about how you use it and how you customize it.

Superb phone, long lasting battery, excellent camera with document scanner
facility and manual mode. Manual mode make u a professional photographer, the
foremost important thing is it's not get heated even after hours of gaming or
video streaming. While charging also it's not get heated and fully charged
within 2 hrs. The USP of the phone is tower picking, I have Moto G3 and
Samsung's a9. It not even pick up tower signal in remote areas but Honor 6x is
excellent in it. It get the signal with full 4g support. Am using this phone
for last one month. Really worth for bugs.

Bought it(4 gb, 64gb) on Rs.7796/- after exchanging my 20 month old coolpad
note 3 lite on 2103 rs.  
Now coming to device.this device loaded with marshmallow os, thankfully got
nogut on same day ota update.  
Emui 5.0 have app drawer feature. I dont like multiple home screen feature. I
am waiting for oreo update now, however there is no confirmation from honor
side, kept my finger crossed  
Camera- i have bought this phone just for camera. Excellent low light
performance. This device easily beat mi a1, Moto g5s plus in low light
performance. However bokeh mode is not good.cant detect edges properly. But
camera is best i am loving this camera  
Battery- this device last typical working day please note i am heavy user. So
though you are heavy user , you dont need to connect charger in a day. Battery
last 1.5 day for moderate user  
Screen quality- screen quality is excellent  
Build quality is also excellent  
Emui 5.0- is far better than other chinese ui and stock android version  
Though this device launched in 2017 still it is best buy if you get below 10
k.dont go for honor 9 lite , its having glass back, easily broke in just one
fall.

title: Camera is quite good and gives the SLR feelings with depth analyzer
Super duper... Cool phone...
Total value for money
True Reviews
The phone is very good with premium look and thin body
Really Amazing

Overall a very good smartphone
Dual Camera phone @ budget 10990 with great stylish looks...
Writing review after 9 months usage.
review:
Camera is quite good and gives the SLR feelings with depth analyzer. Although
the selfie cam requires improvement.  
Performance wise okay sort in this price range  
In built apps are good and in house OS junk & memory handlers are a big plus
which requires no third party app installation to maintain this phone and it's
quite good  
Phone's output volumes - both from loudspeaker and call speaker are bit less,
with headphones it produces decent sound though  
OS updates are okay, it delivers what it promised but updates appear
considerably later than other products in the market  
Battery is ok sort, with the provide mAH, it should have performed better  
Big turn off is hybrid second SIM slot, which considerably lessens opportunity
as a smartphone user, I mean why companies even think of hybrid slots in this
age!!!!  
All in all, a good candidate with decent camera features in sub 15K category.

Awesome product... Though honor doesn't advertise it self much but I could
surely assure that it is no less than the big brands in our Indian market...
Very feature of the phone is at its best... And the most promising feature of
it is its camera... I could bet it could defeat Any of the camera phone in the
market... No such lags... Just some times it gets heat up after a long
duration of continuous use... Which is a common problem in every smart
phones... Else other features are at its best... I personally would recommend
this phone... At its price..

Though skeptical at first, I finally ended up buying the Honor 6X hoping it to

The features are good, UI is smooth, the phone does not lag and the camera is

card slot.. Apart from that, everything else is just perfect for the price
paid

Review updated (16/02/18)  
\-------------------------------------------  
Pros:-  
1\. Display: 4.5/5*  
  
2\. Camera: 4.5/5*  
  
3\. Battery backup: 4/5*  
  
4\. Performance: 4/5*  
  
5\. Software & Updates: 4/5*  
\---------------------------------------  
Cons:-  
1\. I think the biggest drawback of this phone is the sound output and its
quality. Sound output and its quality via the main loud speaker is just
average (if the volume is set below 60%), at higher volume it is the worst I
have ever heard. The sound output quality via earphones is good but the max
volume is quite low (It's like 70% of Redmi 4/5A)  
  
2\. Display backlight flickering issue on brightness changing (I think it's
software related and can be fixed easily with an ota).  
  
3\. 4G can be used in any sim slots but only one sim slot supports 4G while
the other one supports only 2G  
\-------------  
Others:-  
1\. Charging time: It takes 2.5 hrs to charge the phone (0-100%) using
supplied charger (5V/2Amp)  
  
2\. Battery backup: Easily lasts 2 days with normal usage and 5-6 hrs of
screen on time (SOT)

i received this on thursday august 2017. built quality is good. looks wise
very imperesive on hand. camera department is nice i think this is good but
not best in low light photography. some noice you see when you zoom the
picture. the charger a bit slow it takes 2.5 hours to full charge. i am a
light gamer so it is good device for me. out of the box the software is 6.0
but when i connect to internet i found 7.0 nougat. but i don't why seller send
made in china box. i have not much problem by this but where is made in india
pack. so overall good experience with this device. i purchased this at 10990
rs.

I have used the phone for about a month and I would say it's splendid!  
I purchased this phone on the MAY 2017.  
I bought is for Rs. 13000-/  
I am writing this review after 9 months of usage  
Till now I have not found any fault in the phone  
The phone is working super duper smooth  
It is receiving updates at regular intervals.  
  
PROS:  
->Camera (Best in class for the price, hands down)  
->Day to day performance is top notch and absolutely no heating. Kirin 655 rocks.  
-> Battery life is decent 1 and half days on a single charge and normal usage. Phone charges in about 2hrs 15 minutes.  
->All sensors are present and pedometer is a bonus.  
->EMUI 5 is feature rich, elegant and snappy.  
->The screen has nice viewing angles and the colours are pretty accurate. It's quite sharp and and has enough brightness for outdoor visibility.  
-> Recently working on Naught 7.0 and to the Oreo 8.0 is on the way,  
CONS:  
->With dual SIM only one slot acts as 4G and the other reverts to 2G only.  
->The back has a faint and wierd creeking sound but it can be easily fixed by using a case, so not a major issue.  
->The speaker output has decent loudness but the quality is not up to the mark.  
->No Equaliser settings are present in the phone.  
->No Gorilla Glass protection.  
  
I would advise everyone to put case on the phone as it helps in protecting the
camera lens and the edges are slightly raised and screen is also protected.

title: Nice buy

Buy Now Regret later
Good
I love its look and style its slim with 5.5" Screen.
review:
Using it for 3 months now and seems very decent phone for its price 11k with
additional cashback. Back Camera is good - better than redmi 4 but not as
great as some reviews suggest. And after installing many apps n multitasking(
eg running multiple browser windows , hotstar, prime, YouTube, wync, camera n
few more apps) I noticed some lag, nothing major though. Other than what most
reviews already hilighted in pros n cons I would mention "eye comfort" as
pros.. Con would honor "Mirrorshare" is not smooth with my LG TV campared to
"super cast" of my Lenovo phone. Infact same version of hotstar wont cast at
all with this phone but works perfectly on Lenovo which I find surprising.

PROS  
\- Sturdy  
\- Pre loaded screen guard  
\- Dual Sim  
\- Dual Cam (Good picture quality as compared to rivals)  
\- Initial battery life if 1.5 days now after 9 month reduced to less than 1
day  
\- Screen colour hues are configurable. Much Much better than crappy yellow
tones on MI displays which you can't control.  
\- This makes it very good phone to edit pictures  
\- Deep enough blacks  
\- Huawei models are available internationally as compared to MI that are more
intended for Indian market  
\- Huge difference in streaming music over bluetooth when compared with Moto G
5. Music quality over bluetooth is much better than Moto G 5.  
  
CONS  
\- Only single sim supports 4G (WTF...)  
\- Krin processors with EMUI are bit slow as compared to rivals like MI  
\- Slow to charge when compared to MI phones with same battery capacity and
charging specs (5V 2.1 Ampere)

I have used lot of phones, but I love this phone so much. Performance, memory

for this phone. After using this phone for last 2 weeks didn't find any issues
. Only thing I love to improve in this phone is sound its bit low.  
  
Performance 9.5/10  
Camera 9/10  
Memory management 9.5/10  
Battery 9/10

It was obvious that honor 6x will never get oreo update. The 7x is in market.
all focus will be on promoting 7x. And they had already given 1 major update
for 6x. The only thing I did not like was the fraudulent promotion of honor 6x
in the second half of 2017. There were news about oreo update confirmed for
honor 6x with reffence of some company person's statement. After this price
was droped. and then after few months 7x was released. Looking at this, it was
very clear that news of "confirmed oreo update for honor 6x" by the end of
january 2016, was a marketing stratergy to clear the stock of 6x befor release
of 7x. Company was not openly denying the oreo update to 6x till now because
they don't want to affect the 7x sale. Not giving major android os update is
important negative point for any company. So we were getting vague answers
that "the update is under evaluation".  
  
Agreed that they had given one major update for 6x, but the phone (released
with android 6) had many important issues such as volte connectivity problem.
Phone was officialy released in feb 2017. in the current competition of
smartphones, users expect at least 18 months (if not 2 years) of update
support. Also considering (false) marketing of confirmed oreo update for 6x,
its expected that company shoud have given oreo update for 6x.  
  
I think 6x users, who were highly expecting oreo update, shoud take out at
least 2 to 3 min to post about this issue on social media and importantly in
the Amazon review of honor 7x. Spreadinig "Huawei is the company which does
not give major updates" is the only way to force them to rethink their update
stratergy. Same thing had happen before with Samsung (The update policy was
improved from worst to average ;)  
  
Not only Android update, there are many minor and some major issues in honor
6x. Heating, bleutooth syncing/connectivity Camera, etc.  
  
Good bye to Huawei - my first and last phone of Huawei company. And worst
expirience.

I do not want to write technical positives/negatives. But I would say Huawei
keeps the standards in all aspects.

After Using it since 20days. I love its look and style its slim with 5.5 inch
Display. It have inbuilt function for dual watsapp and dual fb with dual
screen without installing app for dual fb, watsapp such as parellel space,etc.
Front facing and dual back camera work with full hd shots its mind blowing ,
awesome hats off to honor for such quality in 11k. Battery back up is also too
good as i use fb,watsapp and several app at 9:30am but at the end of the day
battry shows 67% which sounds good. But there is a little bit lagging as kirin
processor are not so much eligible as snapdragon.

traffic.  
One thing to suggest amazon team is please develop option of sending invoice
of the item to the customer after delivery like flipkart does.

Using this phone for last 6 months. I faced absolutely no problem with the
device. Very smooth and fluid Android experience. Phone got better and better
with new updates. The camera is best in this price segment.

It's good phone but there is a drawback. If you are a selfie lover and you are
going to purchase it due to it's camera quality please keep following issue in
your mind:  
  
There is no flash in selfie camera. It use your phone's light to use selfie in
dark-light which isn't sufficient.  
  
By the camera quality is amazing and you will love the photos of it.

At first, I thought of return the phone as it came with Android 6.0
marshmallow and with some network issues . But, after updating to Android 7.0
Nougat and EMU 5.1 Version all the issues are neutralized and it is simply
amazing.... Self cam images are so beautiful. Little bit disappointing with
back cam images. No heating issues while charging and playing games. WORTHY

Bought it for 7999 on great indian sale.  
Used for 1 month  
  
Nice display, better than rn4  
Performance is great at thas price....hangs 1 time i dont know why but it
freezes for almost 1 minute and then automatically restarted and become
normal.  
Battery performance is good could have been better.  
Rear camera is takes some good shots in low light also. But I dont like the
frnt camera my sis rn3 frnt camera is better than this and my previous Zenfone
2 laser. Call quality and network reception is good. EMUI is great better than
my previous zenui.. people says miui is better but I dont like miui.  
Sound quality through speaker is not great as redmi phones but better than
many other phones. Headphone sound quality is better than previous zenfone. Rn
4 build quality seems good than this.  
Overall at 7999 it is very good deal. Buy if got less than 9000 otherwise go
for redmi note 5.
